howToBuy1Desc: Acquire cryptocurrency and store it on an exchange or in a wallet. You can use popular exchanges like Binance, Coinbase, or Kraken, or set up wallets like MetaMask, Trust Wallet, or Phantom. Purchase assets suitable for paying for $PEPEMEME, such as USDT, SOL, BTC, ETH, and others. The earlier you acquire cryptocurrency, the sooner you can buy $PEPEMEME and receive more tokens.
howToBuy2Desc: Connect to the $PEPEMEME pre-market section. Use your wallet (e.g., MetaMask, Trust Wallet, Phantom, etc.), social networks, or email to connect. Ensure your wallet supports the chosen cryptocurrency. The larger the amount you plan to spend, the higher the rank assigned to you, granting you more bonus tokens.
howToBuy3Desc: Go to the 'Buy $PEPEMEME' section. Choose the cryptocurrency for payment (e.g., USDT, SOL, BTC, ETH, etc.) and enter the amount. The site will automatically calculate the number of $PEPEMEME tokens you will receive. Remember, the higher the purchase amount, the higher your rank and the more bonus tokens you will get.
howToBuy4Desc: Complete the purchase by transferring the specified amount to the provided address. Follow the instructions on the payment page to successfully complete the transaction. The faster you make the purchase, the more $PEPEMEME tokens you will receive due to early participation.

footerText1: $PEPEMEME coin has no association with Matt Furie or his creation Pepe the Frog. This token is simply paying homage to a meme we all love and recognize.
